us.phonetic: /v. ˌoʊvɚˈlæp; n. ˈoʊvɚˌlæp/, (v. ō′vər lap′; n. ō′vər lap′)

example.eg: The slates on the roof overlap.
example.egtrans: 屋顶上的石板瓦彼此叠搭着。

example.eg: Each tile overlaps the one below.
example.egtrans: 上下每一块瓦片都相互重叠。

example.eg: Each tile has a three-centimetre overlap.
example.egtrans: 每块瓦片都有3厘米的重叠处。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 重叠，重合, 重叠度，重合度

us.phonetic: /v. ˌoʊvɚˈlæp; n. ˈoʊvɚˌlæp/, (v. ō′vər lap′; n. ō′vər lap′)

example.eg: There is an overlap between these two theories.
example.egtrans: 这两种理论有相互重叠的部分。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 重叠部分, 类似部分

example.egtrans: 我们的工作时间重叠了。

example.eg: My working hours overlap my husband's.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与…重叠, 与…同时发生

example.eg: This exhibition overlaps my interests in both insects and drawing.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与…有相同之处，与…有共同之处
